test_your_xhosa_knowledge: Leka tsebo ya gago ya Xhosa le Sazi le lelapa la gagwe pele o tsenella mo dithutong tsa rona tse monate le tse dirisanang! Tlhopa leemo la gago, araba dipotso tse mmalwa, kapa o senole dikarabo go simolola go ithuta jaanong.
select_your_xhosa_level: Tlhopa leemo la gago la Xhosa
beginner_no_or_basic_knowledge: Yo o Simololang (A sena kapa Tsebo ya Motheo)
what_is_in_xhosa: Ke eng e reng "{{english}}" ka Xhosa?
nice_try_correct_answer: O lekile sentle! Karabo e e nepahetseng ke {{answer}}.
test_your_xhosa_knowledge_full: Leka tsebo ya gago ya Xhosa le Sazi le lelapa la gagwe pele o tsenella mo dithutong tsa rona tse monate le tse dirisanang! Mo Saz’ isiXhosa, no Sapho, re laletsa baithuti ba dingwaga tsohle go hlola botlhokwa jwa puo ya Xhosa le setso. Tlhopa leemo la gago—yo o simololang, magareng, kapa setsebi/sebuelli sa motheo—mme o arabele dipotso tse mmalwa go lekanya bokgoni ba gago. O ka boela wa senola dikarabo go simolola go ithuta ka pele.
our_site_offers: Sebaka sa rona sa inthanete se fana ka sebaka se se mofuthu, se se kgatlhisang go ithuta ka mantshu, dipolelo, dinomoro, thutapuo, le kitso ya setso. Go tswa mo thabong ya Ukuxoxa Iintsomi (go bua dipale) go ya go bokgoni ba puo bo bo dirang, re kopanya lefa le thuto ya sejwalejwale. Hlola karolo ya rona ya Setso go bona dipale tsa Transkei kapa leka Ditiro tsa rona go dira gore thuto e nne monate. A re bolokeng Xhosa e tshela mmogo!
